meanings.definition: A container or vessel for holding liquids, typically made of metal or ceramic.
meanings.sent1: I poured water into the cann.
meanings.sent2: The cann was filled with soup.
meanings.sent3: The cann rolled off the table and made a big mess!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled out of her like water from a cann.
meanings.sent5: The shiny cann gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.sent3: I cann eat a whole pizza by myself!
meanings.sent5: With practice, you cann improve your skills.

meanings.definition: To cut off the top of a plant.
meanings.sent1: I will cann the flowers for a bouquet.
meanings.sent2: She cann the bushes in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The gardener accidentally cann the wrong plant!
meanings.sent4: The wind cann the tree branches like a skilled pruner.
meanings.sent5: The scissors cann the rose stem cleanly.
